japanese: 私はあなたほど忙しくありません。
english: I am not as busy as you.

japanese: 彼は私ほど速く泳げません。
english: He can't swim as fast as I.

japanese: 彼女は世界で最も有名な歌手の一人です。
english: She is one of the most famous singers in the world.

japanese: サッカーは日本で最も人気のあるスポーツの一つです。
english: Soccer is one of the most popular sports in Japan.

japanese: 彼は４人の中で一番背が高い。
english: He is the tallest of the four.

japanese: カナダは中国よりずっと大きいです。
english: Canada is a little larger than China.

japanese: 信濃川は日本で一番長い川です。
english: The Shinano is the longest river in Japan.

japanese: あなたは私ほど若くありません。
english: You are not as young as I.

japanese: 彼は世界で最も優れた科学者の一人です。
english: He is one of the best scientists in the world.

japanese: この冬は去年ほど寒くありません。
english: This winter is not as cold as last year.
